subject: Re: Naming Test classes, was:Re: [junit] Test Variants
msgSnippet: I missed something. What s wrong with AccountTransferTest ? Is there already a class called AccountTransfer ? If there is, then perhaps the class is
messageBody:
I missed something. What's wrong with "AccountTransferTest"? Is there
already a class called "AccountTransfer"? If there is, then perhaps the
class is misnamed.

*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 2002-07-05 at 09:06 Johannes Link wrote:

>> Simply choose descriptive names. Why wouldn't that be enough to find
>> the tests? If you had to name the test RIGHT NOW, what would you
name
>> it? Perhaps that name is good enough.
>
>Would your suggestion for the test class which has two accounts in its
>fixture then be "AccountTestWithTwoAccounts" rather than
>"AccountTranferTest"?
>What about the one transfer test which needs only one account? Where
does
>it go?
>
>Johannes
